EmailTemplate.name: eCommerce Freshop Campaign.06-08-2021 RET eCommerce Freshop Campaign Email 4.Sub
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks! Now For the Fun Part
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Thanks for attending our Progressive Grocer webinar. We hope you left energized about the future of grocery shopping and what launching an eCommerce platform means for your stores. Now that you know the importance of an “every channel” experience for increasing customer loyalty, basket size, retailer ROI and engagement, let NCR help you get there. Our cloud-native solution seamlessly integrates into the systems you depend on to run your business, giving you more time to focus on your priorities. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
